summary: The Thalmor have discovered certain artifacts that allow them to launch an assault on Sovngarde, the realm of Skyrim's honored dead. Only one person is crazy enough to stop them -- you.
descriptionHtml:
The dark taint of the Thalmor has corrupted Sovngarde's Hall of Valor, its effects rippling through the realms to the land of the living. In Stealing Sovngarde, you must journey to a mysterious island and discover what the altmer have been trying to keep hidden; a massive underground complex built atop an ancient Nordic crypt. Many foes, some elven, some not quite alive, will try to stop you

Stealing Sovngarde is my third mod for [i]The Elder Scrolls V: Skyrim[/i]. With it, I have branched out from previous mods and have learned a few new tricks such as creating world spaces, scripting more complex encounters, and generating LOD. As such, it is by no means a masterpiece, but do try to have some fun with it!

[b]Installation[/b]
To install, simply extract the contents of the .zip file into your Skyrim/Data folder (usually found at Program Files/Steam/steamapps/common/Skyrim). When the game's launcher loads up, make sure the stealingsovngarde.esp data file is enabled before starting the game.

[b]Questions/Comments[/b]
Please feel free to drop a comment below or message me privately with any questions you may have, bugs you've encountered, comments or feedback.

[b]Changelog[/b]
Version 1.1: Added a quest marker to the entrance of the crypts

Version 1.2: Removed the portcullis leading to Ersantus's room
author: Lysogen
